'''Voyage to the Sanguine Sky''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in [[Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula]] at [[Luhua Pool]].

==Enemies==
{{Domain Enemies
|name1=Voyage to the Sanguine Sky
|target1=Defeat all enemies.
|enemies1=Ruin Guard*2;Ruin Hunter
}}

==Trivia==
* In the original Chinese text, the Realm of Clouds is called {{Lang|mini=1|zh=云海洞天|zh_rm=Yúnhǎi Dòngtiān|zh_tl={{w|Sea of clouds|Sea of Clouds}} Paradise (Realm)}}. This uses a slightly different term from the in-game area called the {{Lang|[[Sea of Clouds]]|zh=云来海|zh_rm=Yúnlái Hǎi|zh_tl=Cloud-Coming Sea}} in the English version.
** The term typically translated by the English localization as "realm" (in regards to adepti-created subspaces, including the [[Serenitea Pot|Realm Within]]) is {{Lang|mini=1|zh=洞天|zh_rm=dòngtiān|zh_tl=paradise}} in the original Chinese text.
